verbs.description: One part of [ARG1: the agreement] [V: signed] [ARG0: by President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] includes a commitment to recover and return the remains of U.S. Soldiers killed in the Korean War .

[ARG2: One part of the agreement signed by President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: includes] [ARG1: a commitment to recover and return the remains of U.S. Soldiers killed in the Korean War] .

One part of the agreement signed by President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un includes a commitment to [V: recover] and return [ARG1: the remains of U.S. Soldiers killed in the Korean War] .

One part of the agreement signed by President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un includes a commitment to recover and [V: return] [ARG1: the remains of U.S. Soldiers killed in the Korean War] .

One part of the agreement signed by President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un includes a commitment to recover and return the remains of [ARG1: U.S. Soldiers] [V: killed] [ARGM-LOC: in the Korean War] .
